sect1.title: Exporting Text Files
sect1.para: &gnum; can export files or file fragments that consist entirely of text. Text files provide a basic, common format enabling programs to share data.

sect3.title: The Text Export Druid
sect3.para: After specifying the Text File Export Format and a file name in the Save as.. dialog, the text export druid starts to guide you through the various options:

textobject.phrase: An image of the first page of the text export druid.

listitem.para: Choose the line terminator to use. You should select it based on the platform you want the created file to be used on. Choose one of several field separators and whether to quote all fields or only as needed. The defaults create the standard Unix csv format.

textobject.phrase: An image of the second page of the text export druid.

listitem.para: Select Finish to finally export the selected sheets and create the text file. The standard csv output of is shown in .
